mapper.select: SELECT cal.f_date AS fDate, COUNT( log.id ) AS count, count( log.user_id = 11 OR NULL ) FROM t_sys_calendar cal LEFT JOIN ams_user_log log ON DATE_FORMAT( log.log_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = cal.f_date WHERE cal.f_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 7 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 0 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) GROUP BY cal.f_date ORDER BY cal.f_date
